${modID}:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
${modID}:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

${modID}:conquerorWorm.NAME: Conqueror Worm
DESCRIPTIONS: All enemies have less health, but have a small chance to give you a parasite.

${modID}:ashTray.NAME: Ash Tray
DESCRIPTIONS: Every 3rd card that exhausts when played is refunded its energy cost.
